name: react-top-and-bottom-scroll
description: Enhance your React components with dual-scroll functionality using the react-top-bottom-scroll package. By default, HTML provides a single scrollbar at the bottom of a container when overflow occurs. However, with react-top-bottom-scroll, you can effortlessly add mirrored scrollbars at both the top and bottom of any component or HTML element.
author: Faizan Ahmed
